greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of the harmonic mean of the first n composite numbers.
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
example: a(3) = 72 because the first 3 composite numbers are [4,6,8] and 3 / (1/4+1/6+1/8) = 72/13.
program: composite(n) = for(k=0, primepi(n), isprime(n++)&&k--); n \\ from A002808
s=vector(100); for(k=1, #s, s[k]=numerator(harmonicmean(vector(k, i, composite(i))))); s
results.author: _Colin Barker_, Nov 14 2014
